# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    words = split(str, ' ')
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    push!(lines, line)
    return lines
end
```
Here's an example usage:
```julia
str = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed nec egestas nisl."
println(wrap_string(str))
```
This will output:
```
Lorem ipsum dolor
sit amet, consectetur
adipiscing elit. Sed nec
egestas nisl.
```
